parameter.name: targetPageText
parameter.value: Located between 3rd and 9th Streets along Constitution Avenue NW

parameter.name: targetPageText
parameter.value: The Gallery is committed to making its collection, buildings, and programs accessible to all audiences

parameter.name: targetPageText
parameter.value: Explore the Gallery's collections, exhibitions, and Sculpture Garden with guided tours, family guides, audio tours, and more.

parameter.name: targetPageText
parameter.value: No visit to the National Gallery of Art is complete without browsing through the Gallery Shops to sample our attractive, educational, and ever-changing assortment of merchandise related to the permanent collection and special exhibitions.

parameter.name: targetPageText
parameter.value: Located on the National Mall between 7th and 9th Streets along Constitution Avenue NW, the Ice Rink is a favorite Washington destination, attracting thousands of visitors to skate in the nation's capital.

parameter.name: targetPageText
parameter.value: The copyist program at the National Gallery of Art offers a unique opportunity for artists to study the techniques of old masters through intimate study in the galleries.

parameter.name: targetPageText
parameter.value: For the protection of visitors and staff, as well as to preserve the Gallery's collections and facilities

parameter.name: targetPageText
parameter.value: Since 1964 the National Gallery of Art has offered professional museum training to candidates from all backgrounds through a variety of internship and volunteer programs.

parameter.name: targetPageText
parameter.value: Center for Advanced Study in the Visual Arts (CASVA)

parameter.name: targetPageText
parameter.value: Andrew W. Mellon believed that his founding gifts would lead to successive waves of generosity, enriching the nation’s cultural heritage.

parameter.name: targetPageText
parameter.value: Private donations, in any amount, help sustain the Gallery’s standard of excellence envisioned by our founder, Andrew W. Mellon

parameter.name: targetPageText
parameter.value: Planned gifts benefit the Gallery and provide the donor with an opportunity to create a lasting legacy for future generations while maximizing the tax benefits of a donation.

parameter.name: targetPageText
parameter.value: Corporate Sponsorship offers corporations global visibility for their support of special exhibitions and important cultural programs.

parameter.name: targetPageText
parameter.value: The National Gallery of Art houses a collection of masterpieces—American and European paintings, sculptures, prints, drawings, and photographs—dating from the late Middle Ages to the present day.

parameter.name: targetPageTitle
parameter.value: National Gallery of Art Shops | Fine Museum Gifts | shop.nga.gov

parameter.name: targetPageText
parameter.value: The National Gallery's renowned collection of paintings, sculpture, decorative arts, prints, and drawings is among the finest and most visited in the United States. Originally created in 1937 as a gift to the American people by Andrew Mellon

parameter.name: targetPageTitle
parameter.value: Exhibitions | National Gallery of Art Shops | shop.nga.gov

parameter.name: targetPageText
parameter.value: The National Gallery of Art’s exhibition merchandise ranges from catalogs and other publications to jewelry and giftware, printed products such as posters and stationery, and other items, all created from the Gallery’s renowned permanent collections as well as the exceptional special exhibitions on view.

parameter.name: targetPageTitle
parameter.value: Books & Media | National Gallery of Art Shops | shop.nga.gov

parameter.name: targetPageText
parameter.value: Explore the world of art through a selection of fascinating books, films, and music developed from Gallery resources and acclaimed scholarship in the field.

parameter.name: targetPageTitle
parameter.value: Stationery - National Gallery of Art Shops

parameter.name: targetPageText
parameter.value: Choose from a selection of traditional and contemporary stationery, note card sets, postcard books, and calendars based on the Gallery’s permanent collection and special exhibitions.

parameter.name: targetPageTitle
parameter.value: Jewelry | National Gallery of Art Shops | shop.nga.gov

parameter.name: targetPageText
parameter.value: Inspired by the Gallery’s collections as well as the artistic principles of color, light, and form, this unique selection of exquisite costume and fine jewelry includes necklaces, earrings, bracelets, pins, watches, rings, and cuff links.

parameter.name: targetPageTitle
parameter.value: Prints - National Gallery of Art Shops

parameter.name: targetPageText
parameter.value: Decorate your walls with posters, matted prints, and prints on canvas in a variety of sizes, created from images in our permanent collection and special exhibitions.

parameter.name: targetPageTitle
parameter.value: Apparel | National Gallery of Art Shops | shop.nga.gov

parameter.name: targetPageText
parameter.value: Browse a wide variety of stylish apparel that includes scarves, shawls, hats, T-shirts, ties, pocket squares, and children’s clothing.

parameter.name: targetPageTitle
parameter.value: For the Home | National Gallery of Art Shops | shop.nga.gov

parameter.name: targetPageText
parameter.value: Make the Gallery’s art part of your home decor with our exciting assortment of home wares inspired by the collection.

parameter.name: targetPageTitle
parameter.value: Kids - National Gallery of Art Shops

parameter.name: targetPageText
parameter.value: Delight children of all ages with our assortment of fun and educational toys that inspire creativity and learning, including art-oriented books and crafts, activity kits, baby and early childhood gifts, building blocks, games, puzzles, plush animals, children’s apparel, and more.
